overview: A boy came out dressed as a girl, was assaulted and had his body thrown into the waters of rivers in the Amazon. Upon submerging, it returned in the form of the mururé flower, an aquatic plant with female and male characteristics, of Amazonian origin, very common in the Afuá region. This short film presents a fictional episode of violence featuring  an actress in her first role after their gender transitioning.
title: Flor de Mururé
